title: GitHub Agent Repository Configuration
description: Configuration schema for multiple repository support in GitHub MCP Agent. Repository identifiers (keys) become part of MCP server URLs: http://localhost:8080/mcp/{identifier}/

repositories.description: Dictionary of repository configurations. Keys are repository identifiers used in URLs.

^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$.description: Repository configuration. The key becomes the repository identifier in MCP URLs.

path.description: Absolute path to the git repository (relative paths not allowed)

workspace.description: Absolute path to the git repository workspace (relative paths not allowed)

port.description: Port number for the MCP server

python_path.description: Path to Python executable for this repository

pre_commit_scripts.description: Scripts to run before committing code, in the order they should be executed

script.description: Script path relative to repository root or absolute command

description.description: Optional description of what this script does

required.description: Whether this script must pass for commit to proceed

timeout.description: Timeout in seconds for script execution
